scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc
scripts.clean: node -e "var { rmdirSync, existsSync } = require('fs'), path = require('path'); ['./.nyc_output', './coverage', './dist'].forEach(fPath => {if (existsSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath))) rmdirSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath), { recursive: true })}); process.exit(0);"
